scripts.prebuild: npm run prisma:generate-migration-scripts --workspace=@golobe-demo/backend && npm run cms-startup --workspace=@golobe-demo/backend && npx uglifyjs public/js/page-load.js  --compress --mangle -o public/js/page-load.min.js && npx copyfiles -E -f ./packages/shared/locales/* assets/locales
scripts.build: npx env-cmd -f .env npm run build:checks && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' nuxt build
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && npx copyfiles -E -f ./packages/shared/locales/* .nuxt/locales && cross-env NEXTAUTH_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/auth ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=1 nuxt dev
scripts.preview: npx copyfiles -E -f ./packages/shared/locales/* .output/locales && cross-env NEXTAUTH_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/auth env-cmd -f ./packages/backend/.env nuxt preview
scripts.preview:electron: npm run preview & npx electron . --no-sandbox --enable-logging dist-electron/main.js
scripts.apptests: npx env-cmd -f .env cross-env VITE_VITEST=true npm run build:checks && npx copyfiles -E -f ./packages/shared/locales/* assets/locales && env-cmd -f ./packages/backend/.env cross-env VITE_VITEST=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096 --disable-warning=DEP0166 --disable-warning=DEP0155' NEXTAUTH_URL=http://127.0.0.1:43321/api/auth npx vitest run --dir=./tests
scripts.quickstart:build: env-cmd -f ./packages/backend/.env cross-env NODE_ENV=production VITE_QUICKSTART=1 NODE_OPTIONS='--disable-warning=DEP0166 --disable-warning=DEP0155' npm run build
scripts.quickstart:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=production VITE_QUICKSTART=1 npm run preview
scripts.quickstart:run:electron:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=production VITE_QUICKSTART=1 npm run preview
scripts.quickstart:run:electron: npm run quickstart:run:electron:client | npm run quickstart:run:electron:server
scripts.quickstart: npm run quickstart:prepare --workspace=@golobe-demo/backend && npm run quickstart:build && npm run quickstart:run
scripts.quickstart:electron: npm run quickstart:prepare --workspace=@golobe-demo/backend && npm run quickstart:build && npm run quickstart:run:electron
